__e: If by "hexed" you mean "bat-shit crazy"... -...then you're hexed.
I used to think, if I cared at all, I would have to care about everything and I'd go stark raving mad.
Then, suddenly, I was on the outside of my body, watching a woman who looked like me becoming a raving maniac.
You're not gonna torment me now.
In that case, nothing could distress me more than for you to think me cruel.
Are we set? Tomorrow night, the Blenheim.
Don't let the death of your mother haunts you for the rest of your live. Get on with it.
There was a time I would have wished you dead but your shame will be your torture.
If you persist... ..it will torment you.
